channel.title: What is this?
channel.description: [java] Adding save data for: Regtest [java] java.sql.SQLException: Data truncation: Out of range value for colum n 'topcolour' at row 20: 'UPDATE `rscd_players` SET `combat`=16, skill_total=115 , `x`=262, `y`='1483', `fatigue`='61', `haircolour`=5, `topcolour`=-53, `trouser colour`=0, `skincolour`=1, `headsprite`=8, `bodysprite`=8, `male`=0, `skulled`=7 4311597169836032, `combatstyle`=0 WHERE `user`=46543934902' [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.net.DatabaseConnection.updateQuery(DatabaseC onnection.java:109) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.model.PlayerSave.save(PlayerSave.java:658) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.loginserver.PlayerSaveHandler. handlePacket(PlayerSaveHandler.java:80) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.processIncomingPackets(LoginEngi ne.java:129) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.run(LoginEngine.java:55) [java] Java Result: 1

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Its trying to insert -53 as the “top color” into the database which is a no no.

Read full topic

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

update the connector/J which I’m not sure if you know how to do. Another alternative I think is changing all unsigned to signed in table in phpmyadmin.
